scripts.precoffee: fd . -e coffee app | xargs awk '(FNR==1){print "\n\n# " FILENAME}1' node_modules/take-and-make/source/*.coffee node_modules/bucket/{debounced,monkey-patch,test}.coffee node_modules/doom/*.coffee > build/app.coffee
scripts.prescss: fd . -e scss app | xargs awk '(FNR==1){print "\n\n// " FILENAME}1' > build/app.scss
scripts.prestart: npm run coffee && npm run scss
scripts.start: npm run watch-coffee & npm run watch-scss & npm run serve
